bibl.title: The Doha Head: A Late Period Egyptian Portrait. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Doha, Qatar, The Islamic Museum, Inv. Nr. unknown (formerly in the Thalassic Collection). Grayish-white quartzite, H. 17,4 cm. Portrait-like head of a priest, Dynasty XXX or Early Ptolemaic Period. Its style is related to some well-known realistic sculptures such as the Boston and Berlin "green heads".
bibl.seg: JOSEPHSON Jack A., Paul O'ROURKE and Richard FAZZINI, The Doha Head: A Late Period Egyptian Portrait. Avec résumé en anglais.

Doha, Qatar, The Islamic Museum, Inv. Nr. unknown (formerly in the Thalassic Collection). Grayish-white quartzite, H. 17,4 cm. Portrait-like head of a priest, Dynasty XXX or Early Ptolemaic Period. Its style is related to some well-known realistic sculptures such as the Boston and Berlin "green heads".
